name: 100% Whole Grain Tomato Basil Focaccia. Vegan Recipe
description: 100% Whole Grain Tomato Basil Focaccia. Whole Wheat Tomato Basil Foaccia bread Recipe. Use other herbs like rosemary or thyme. Vegan Soy-free Recipe Makes a 9 by 5 inch 1.5 inch thick focaccia
recipeIngredient: finely chopped fresh basil or dried basil

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add warm water, yeast, maple syrup and molasses. Mix and let the yeast activate and and get frothy for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add warm water, yeast, maple syrup and molasses. Mix and let the yeast activate and and get frothy for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the rest of the ingredients and knead for 5-6 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the rest of the ingredients and knead for 5-6 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a tablespoon or so more water or flour, if needed to make a soft to touch dough.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a tablespoon or so more water or flour, if needed to make a soft to touch dough.

recipeInstructions.text: Spray water on top, cover the bowl with a damp towel and Let the dough rise for 2 hours or until doubled.
recipeInstructions.name: Spray water on top, cover the bowl with a damp towel and Let the dough rise for 2 hours or until doubled.

recipeInstructions.text: Punch dough down and shape to fill the pan. I used 9 by 5 inch pan. Push or stretch the dough into the pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Punch dough down and shape to fill the pan. I used 9 by 5 inch pan. Push or stretch the dough into the pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Spray water on top and let the dough rise for 15 minutes in a warm place.
recipeInstructions.name: Spray water on top and let the dough rise for 15 minutes in a warm place.

recipeInstructions.text: Dimple the dough using fingers, Push all the way through the dough.
recipeInstructions.name: Dimple the dough using fingers, Push all the way through the dough.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour olive oil on the dimples. Top with fresh or dried basil and sea salt. then top with sliced cherry tomatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour olive oil on the dimples. Top with fresh or dried basil and sea salt. then top with sliced cherry tomatoes.

recipeInstructions.text: Let rise for another 20-30 minutes or until doubled.
recipeInstructions.name: Let rise for another 20-30 minutes or until doubled.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 25 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Or for a crisp crust, preheat the oven to 450 degrees F / 220ºc, then reduce temperature to 400 F / 200ºc and bake 20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Or for a crisp crust, preheat the oven to 450 degrees F / 220ºc, then reduce temperature to 400 F / 200ºc and bake 20 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool, slice and serve with olive oil. Serve as a side with pasta Or slice horizontally and make a Basil, Lettuce, Tomato, Balsamic grilled Tofu Sandwich
recipeInstructions.name: Cool, slice and serve with olive oil. Serve as a side with pasta Or slice horizontally and make a Basil, Lettuce, Tomato, Balsamic grilled Tofu Sandwich
